allTitles: {"ahk":"Covid-19-ahˇ yahˇ-eu","en":"Avoid Covid-19","lsi":"Covid-19 ri zid” lhid khyoo:","my":"Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း"}

0.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

4.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

5.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020

7.eng: Translator Lanham: Zung” Khoo”, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap

11.eng: Lo, ri Sapya: yo’ ajang” cid” ca” (angh ) Yhid: yo’ koid thu’ to” da” lo, cid” yeing yo’ voin: tang: boid lho: cid” ca”.

12.eng: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
12.lsi: Myo, jid” – nhoo: - nhoid ri azang” thung”.

13.eng: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.
13.lsi: Nhoo” yeing yu: - xam: myhid” noo lang” re” nhoo: yo’ nhoid ri lo, moin” thung” guid” thang: ( angh) lo, boid mougsoug” yo’ nghoeb too” we’. Bain lang” hau: lo, boid mougsoug” ri dalheing dam mhoid khoid pung” moo kaid we’.

14.eng: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.
14.lsi: Byu dayug yo’ dayug agyoo: moo neing: thang’ Dalam ( 6 pe: ) koo: moo nyid we’.

15.eng:
Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
15.lsi: Noo lang” yhoem: moo nyid we’. Zhau” – so’ shi: yau: ziyo’ nge” no nyid lang” je jhang da” mocid” rung” khyoo: myab thang khyo” lo” byang” we’.

16.eng: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
16.lsi: COVID-19 yo’ sen: lho: thang: thang’ shoug” gyo: da” kyoo” dang: ri tam” gyoo: we’. Yang” zain: khyoo: shu” ajhung: mo anoo: tid shed nyid da” kyoo” dang: ri voin: tang: cang’ we’.

bookText.eng:
Avoid Covid-19



Avoid Covid-19
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020
Literacy for Women in Africa
Translator Lanham: Zung” Khoo”, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap



Lo, ri Sapya: yo’ ajang” cid” ca” (angh ) Yhid: yo’ koid thu’ to” da” lo, cid” yeing yo’ voin: tang: boid lho: cid” ca”.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.



Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.


Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.


Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
bookText.lsi:
Covid-19 ri zid” lhid khyoo:




Covid-19 ri zid” lhid khyoo:








Myo, jid” – nhoo: - nhoid ri azang” thung”.
Nhoo” yeing yu: - xam: myhid” noo lang” re” nhoo: yo’ nhoid ri lo, moin” thung” guid” thang: ( angh) lo, boid mougsoug” yo’ nghoeb too” we’. Bain lang” hau: lo, boid mougsoug” ri dalheing dam mhoid khoid pung” moo kaid we’.
Byu dayug yo’ dayug agyoo: moo neing: thang’ Dalam ( 6 pe: ) koo: moo nyid we’.
Noo lang” yhoem: moo nyid we’. Zhau” – so’ shi: yau: ziyo’ nge” no nyid lang” je jhang da” mocid” rung” khyoo: myab thang khyo” lo” byang” we’.
COVID-19 yo’ sen: lho: thang: thang’ shoug” gyo: da” kyoo” dang: ri tam” gyoo: we’. Yang” zain: khyoo: shu” ajhung: mo anoo: tid shed nyid da” kyoo” dang: ri voin: tang: cang’ we’.
